title: Gastroenteritis

fields.name: hydration_plan
fields.label: Hydration plan
fields.default: Small, frequent sips of oral rehydration solution; advance diet as tolerated.

body:
You were treated today for gastroenteritis.

Hydration plan:
{{hydration_plan}}

{{#if antiemetic}}Antiemetic:
{{antiemetic}}

{{/if}}Red flags – return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Unable to keep fluids down for more than 12 hours
- Blood in vomit or stool
- Severe abdominal pain or persistent fever
- Signs of dehydration (very dry mouth, dizziness, minimal urine)

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
